00044   class CellCache : public CellList {
00045 
00046   public:
00047     CellCache() : m_alloc(), m_cell_map(std::less<const SerializedKey>(),
00048         Alloc(m_alloc)), m_memory_used(0), m_deletes(0), m_collisions(0),
00049         m_frozen(false) { }
00050 
00060     virtual int add(const Key &key, const ByteString value);
00061 
00062     virtual const char *get_split_row();

00065 
00066     virtual void get_rows(std::vector<std::string> &rows);
00067 
00068     virtual uint32_t get_total_entries() { return m_cell_map.size(); }
00069 
00073     virtual CellListScanner *create_scanner(ScanContextPtr &scan_ctx);
00074 
00075     void lock()   { if (!m_frozen) m_mutex.lock(); }
00076     void unlock() { if (!m_frozen) m_mutex.unlock(); }
00077 
00078     size_t size() { return m_cell_map.size(); }
00079 
00083     uint64_t memory_used() {
00084       ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00085       return m_memory_used + (m_cell_map.size() * sizeof(CellMap::value_type));
00086     }
00087 
00088     uint32_t get_collision_count() { return m_collisions; }
00089 
00090     uint32_t get_delete_count() { return m_deletes; }
00091 
00092     void freeze() { m_frozen = true; }
00093     void unfreeze() { m_frozen = false; }
00094 
00095     friend class CellCacheScanner;
00096 
00097   protected:
00098     typedef std::pair<const SerializedKey, uint32_t> Value;
00099     typedef CellCachePoolAllocator<Value> Alloc;
00100     typedef std::map<const SerializedKey, uint32_t,
00101                      std::less<const SerializedKey>, Alloc> CellMap;
00102

00104     CellCachePool      m_alloc;
